title: After The Robots Died; The Worms in Our Eyes, Issue #3
description: Arriving as embryos and raised by robots, a colony of children on a distant planet struggle to survive when the robots who raised them begin to shut down.In this chapter, Leda and the robot owls find Benji imprisoned in the woods, but he’s different somehow. The children return to the base and face an alien attack… Or is it? Discover the exciting next issue of “After The Robots Died”.Issue #1 is a first place winner of the 2023 Firebird Book Awards for Comics and Graphic Novels!
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
